attributes.action: Make short selling shares illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details: How on earth can some other company loan out something you own without your consent? I believe that it amounts to legal theft authorised by the government, I think it is open to abuse, and needs to be banned and stopped.
attributes.background: I believe short selling of stocks in the UK causes instability in companies share prices.
